attributes.name: script
script

script
script
script
attributes.value:
var stage = 'clsa-dcs.NeuropsychologicalBattery:'
var sections={
'FAS':[
'FAS_INSTRPT_DCS',
'FAS_INSTLST_DCS'],
'SN':[
'SN_CHILD_DCS',
'SN_CHILDBIO_DCS',
'SN_CHILDADP_DCS',
'SN_CHILDSTP_DCS',
'SN_CHILDPR_DCS',
'SN_CHILDSTPPR_DCS',
'SN_DGHTRLIV_DCS',
'SN_SONLIV_DCS',
'SN_SEECHILD_DCS',
'SN_SIBLIV_DCS',
'SN_SEESIB_DCS',
'SN_RELLIV_DCS',
'SN_SEEREL_DCS',
'SN_FRND_DCS',
'SN_SEEFRND_DCS',
'SN_NEIBR_DCS',
'SN_SEENEIBR_DCS',
'SN_PERWSCH_DCS',
'SN_PERCOM_DCS',
'SN_PERACT_DCS'],
'SPA':[
'SPA_SOAC_DCS',
'SPA_OUTS_DCS',
'SPA_CHRCH_DCS',
'SPA_SPORT_DCS',
'SPA_EDUC_DCS',
'SPA_CLUB_DCS',
'SPA_NEIBR_DCS',
'SPA_VOLUN_DCS',
'SPA_OTACT_DCS',
'SPA_MORAC_DCS',
'SPA_PREVAC_DCS'],
'SSA':[
'SSA_CONFBED_DCS',
'SSA_NDTLK_DCS',
'SSA_CRISIS_DCS',
'SSA_TYTDR_DCS',
'SSA_SHLOV_DCS',
'SSA_GOODT_DCS',
'SSA_INFO_DCS',
'SSA_CONFID_DCS',
'SSA_HUGS_DCS',
'SSA_RELAX_DCS',
'SSA_MEALS_DCS',
'SSA_ADVCE_DCS',
'SSA_MINDOFF_DCS',
'SSA_CHORES_DCS',
'SSA_SHFEAR_DCS',
'SSA_SUGG_DCS',
'SSA_ENJOY_DCS',
'SSA_PROBLM_DCS',
'SSA_LOVU_DCS',
'SSA_PET_DCS'],
'STP':[
'NEUR_CONSREC_DCS',
'STP_DOTRPT_DCS',
'STP_DOTLST_DCS',
'STP_WORRPT_DCS',
'STP_WORLST_DCS',
'STP_COLRPT_DCS',
'STP_COLLST_DCS']
}

var str = []
for(var key in sections) {
  var rcount = 0
  var qcount = 0
  var arr = sections[key]
  for(var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
    var j = $(stage + arr[i])
    if(j.isNull().value()) {
      continue
    }  
    qcount++
    rcount += j.any('REFUSED').value() ? 1 : 0
  }
  if(0 == qcount) {
    str.push(null)
  } else {
    str.push(100.0*rcount/qcount)
  }
}
newSequence(str, 'decimal')
